#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;
int main(){
    long long int n,i,temp,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        long long int arr[n];
        for( i = 0 ; i <n; i++){
            cin>>arr[i];
        }
        sort(arr,arr+n);
        for( i = 1 ; i <n-1; i=i+2){
            temp = arr[i];
            arr[i] = arr[i+1];
            arr[i+1] = temp;
        }
        for( i = 0 ; i <n-1; i++){
            cout<<arr[i]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<arr[n-1]<<endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
